content: held together with gepard garn kid seta in the color 1006 **sizes ** small large **gauge ** 21 stitches per 10 cm **suggested needle size ** 3 5 mm us 4 **suggested yarn ** oliva fibers petite sock 100 g = 425 m or knitting for olive merino 50 g = 250 m or sandnes sunday 50 g = 235 m held together with oliva fibers silk mohair 50 g = 420 m or knitting for olive soft silk mohair 25 g = 225 m or sandnes garn tynn silk mohair 25 g = 212 m **estimated yarn quantity ** 10 + 5 20 + 10 g **level of difficulty ** 3/5 this product is a digital knitting pattern which you will receive as a pdf-file which you can download after purchase pattern is available in norwegian and english translation to additional languages can be considered upon request
